body_html: @rogerpasky For school I had to use Tensorflow for training models, not just for evaluating a model. And I will have to repeat this again in near future. For students like me, having training on GPU is a must, saving a lot of time. It not just a matter to serve multiple concurrent user.

body: @rogerpasky For school I had to use Tensorflow for training models, not just for evaluating a model. And I will have to repeat this again in near future. For students like me, having training on GPU is a must, saving a lot of time. It not just a matter to serve multiple concurrent user.
